"Treasure Trove" - An AI-powered shopping cart that recommends hidden gems and limited edition products to customers. As they shop, the cart identifies their interests and preferences and provides them with personalized suggestions.

"GreenPal" - An eco-friendly shopping cart that helps customers reduce their carbon footprint. It provides them with a "carbon footprint" score, suggesting sustainable products and eco-friendly packaging options.
"WishList Whisperer" - A shopping cart that listens to customers' wishes and provides them with product recommendations based on their secret wants and needs.
"StyleSphere" - A virtual try-on shopping cart that allows customers to virtually try on clothes, makeup, and accessories. It uses AR technology to provide a realistic shopping experience.
"Gourmet Guru" - A shopping cart that provides customers with personalized gourmet food recommendations based on their dietary preferences, ingredient allergies, and cooking skills.
